component.name: unishellect
component.summary: Load a menu of shells/files from a provided JSON configuration file

description.p:
Version 2 of a command line tool to load a menu of commands to help load shells/consoles/interpreters/files with arguments. This is inspired by the "hyper-shellect" plug-in for the "Hyper" terminal.
This tool parses a JSON config file and loads a menu of shells, interpreters, files, commands and possible arguments into any cli.
